remarks: Closed form of ~ bdsepnf .  Version of ~ ax-bdsep with one DV condition removed, the other DV condition replaced by a non-freeness antecedent, and without initial universal quantifier.  (Contributed by BJ, 19-Oct-2019.)
statement:
bdsepnft.1 $e |- Bdd ph $.
bdsepnft $p |- ( A. x F/ b ph -> E. b A. x ( x e. b <-> ( x e. a /\ ph ) ) ) $.
$d a b x $.
